page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN BURNFOOT.
page.content: Burnfoot has quite a lot of industry and has an industrial estate of factory units which house Slumberdown, Elliot Aluminium, Barrie Knitwear and British Beef. In addition to these there are a few small knitwear factories, including Lyle & Scott and a car body repair shop.Slumberdown is the most advanced technologically and has huge complicated machines which perform many different functions at the same time. Computers control the flow of work, weigh the amount of fillings in the quilts and measure the 'tog' value, or heat retaining capacity of each quilt.Strangely enough, few of our parents work in Burnfoot, but travel into Hawick, where the main knitwear factories are situated.
